sen.j: 傘松公園（かさまつこうえん）は、京都府宮津市にある公園。
sen.e: Kasamatsu Park is located in Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kasamatsu Park is located in Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kasamatsu-koen Park is located in Miyazu City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 天橋立を展望するための施設がある。
sen.e: It is provided with a facility for viewing Amanohashidate (a beauty spot: a long narrow land protruding into the sea)
It is provided with a facility for viewing Amanohashidate (a beauty spot: a long narrow land protruding into the sea)
It is provided with a facility for viewing Amanohashidate (a beauty spot: A long narrow land protruding into the sea).
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。

sen.j: 観光名所の一つにもなっている。
sen.e: This park has become a sightseeing spot.
This park has become a sightseeing spot.
This park has become a sightseeing spot.

sen.j: ふもとからは、ケーブルカーかリフトで登れる。
sen.e: It can be reached from the foot of the mountain, where the park is located, with a cable-car or a cable-lifted chair.
It can be reached from the foot of the mountain, where the park is located, with a cable-car or a cable-lifted chair.
It can be reached from the foot of the mountain, where the park is located, with a cable-car or a cable-lifted chair.
Summary of the view
Summary of the view
Summary of the View

sen.j: 傘松公園からみる天橋立は、「斜め一文字」にみることができる。
sen.e: When viewed from Kasamatsu Park, Amanohashidate looks like a slanting Chinese character of "一."
When viewed from Kasamatsu Park, Amanohashidate looks like a slanting Chinese character of "一."
When viewed from Kasamatsu-koen Park, Amanohashidate looks like 'Naname Ichimonji' (a slanting Chinese character of '一' (ichi, literally, one)).

sen.j: ここでは有名な股のぞきをすることができる。
sen.e: Here, it is possible to enjoy famous "matanozoki" viewing (to view Amanohashidate from between your two legs).
Here, it is possible to enjoy famous "matanozoki" viewing (to view Amanohashidate from between your two legs).
Here, it is possible to enjoy famous Matanozoki viewing (to view Amanohashidate from between your two legs).
sen.cmt: クォーテーションをのぞきました。

sen.j: 股のぞきをすると、天地が逆転したように見え、まさに天にかかる橋のようにみえる。
sen.e: Viewed in the "matanozoki" way, the sky and the earth look upside down, making Amanohashidate look just like a bridge across the sky.
Viewed in the "matanozoki" way, the sky and the earth look upside down, making Amanohashidate look just like a bridge across the sky.
Viewed in the Matanozoki way, the sky and the earth look upside down, making Amanohashidate look just like a bridge across the sky.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションをのぞきました。

sen.j: ここは山を登ったところにある。
sen.e: This park is located on a mountain.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: This park is located on a mountain.
This park is located on a mountain.

sen.j: さらに徒歩3分山をのぼると、「傘松」というマツのある『股のぞき発祥の地』もある。
sen.e: However, when the mountain is climbed further for three minutes, there is the birth place of "matanozoki" where a pine named "Kasamatsu (literally, an umbrella pine) is.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, when the mountain is climbed further for three minutes, there is the birth place of "matanozoki" where a pine named "Kasamatsu (literally, an umbrella pine) stands.
However, when the mountain is climbed further for three minutes, there is the birth place of "Matanozoki" where a pine named 'Kasamatsu' (literally, an umbrella pine) stands.
sen.cmt: クォーテーションを変えました。

sen.j: 西国28番の成相寺へ行くバスもここから出ている。
sen.e: Buses for Nariai-ji Temple, the 28th temple of 33 Saigoku Kannon pilgrimage, depart from here as well.
Buses for Nariai-ji Temple, the 28th temple of 33 Saigoku Kannon pilgrimage, depart from here as well.
Buses for Nariai-ji Temple, the 28th temple of the 33 Temples of Kansai Kannon Pilgrimage, depart from here as well.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。
